attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The tenure of the MP for Kirkcaldy & Cowdenbeath as Prime Minister has been an unmitigated disaster for Great Britain. Since the Rt Hon gentleman took ofice we have had to witness, and be affected by, a large number of examples of chronic mismanagement including the Northern Rock fiasco, the erosion of our civil liberties, the 10p tax farce, and the undemocratic attempts to ratify the Treaty of Lison.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
